long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PCRecruiter integration with LinkedIn.

LinkMatch Chrome extension automatically shows which LinkedIn profiles are in your PCRecruiter database. 
That way you don't have to manually check it for yourself, which makes it easier to connect with new candidates right away.
You can also view and edit the profile info of the existed candidates right in the LinkedIn.

Versions history:

3.40
-- bug fixing

3.30
-- LinkMatch now works in LinkedIn groups
-- a lot of bugfixes and improvements

3.22
-- attaching linkedin picture from LinkedIn profile view
-- a lot of stability improvements and bug fixes

-- a log of bug fixes and stability improvements

-- a lot of bug fixes

1.55

1.50

1.40

1.30

1.15

By installing this Chrome Extension you agree to the Terms of Service - linkmatch.net/terms

-----
Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to xing
- *://*.pcrecruiter.net/* - to be able to make requests to PCRecruiter API
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
